name: Klim's Pocket Dimensions
description:
You were lost in the woods when you came across a scary house. You walk inside and find Klim. Klim hid the key to his house at the deepest pocket dimension. If he gets you he will put you into the next pocket dimensions. Find the portals to get out, but make sure you get the key.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Escape - Quit

Walk into portals and keys and click on doors.
